name: MYVI
0:
”Alexa, open my v. i.”
”Alexa, launch my v. i.”
”Alexa, start my v. i.”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: my v. i.
Developer Terms of Use
des:
ABOUT VISION IRELAND:

Vision Ireland (VI) formerly known as Nation Council for Blind in Ireland (NCBI) is a sight loss agency. Vision Ireland aims to transform the lives of people who are blind or vision impaired. 

ABOUT myVI SKILL: 

Whether you are blind, have low vision, or know someone with a vision impairment you can use the myVI Skill to access our information on sight loss and how Vision Ireland can be of help, answers to frequently asked questions on VI Services, sight Loss, treatments, etc. 
 
The myVI Skill also enables the requesting of referrals, and callbacks from Vision Ireland and provides access to media content such as podcasts, newsletters, and audiobooks. 

You can stay connected to Vision Ireland, by accessing information and technology such as our audio library service, day-to-day living techniques, employment readiness, Mobility training, etc. 

SKILL REQUIREMENTS: 

To use the myVI skill you must be 16+ years old and have an Amazon account. To access additional features, we recommend creating a myVI account as well. 

If you are new to Vision Ireland and do not have an Amazon account, please call us on 1800 911110 visit www.vi.ie, or email labs@vi.ie to register or get support creating your Amazon account. Please note that when creating a new Amazon account, it is preferable to create it on www.amazon.co.uk 

The content in this skill is provided for informational and educational purposes only. It is not a substitute for professional medical advice, treatment, or diagnosis. Please speak to your doctor or healthcare provider for medical advice. If you think you may have a medical emergency, please seek immediate medical attention. 

 HOW DOES IT WORKS? 
The section below offers a few quick tips on how to navigate through the skill and which commands to use.

To launch the skill simply say: “Alexa, start myVI” (or) “Alexa, open myVI” 

The list below are examples of some of the phrases that can be used while in the skill: 

· "Alexa, what are the VI additional resources?" 
· "Alexa, what is VI Labs?" 
· "Alexa, information on Core Services." 
· "Alexa, I want to make an Appointment." 
· "Alexa, how can I make a Referral." 
· "Alexa, can you give me Eye Care Tips?" 
· "Alexa, I'd like to listen to a Magazine?" 
· "Alexa, what are the Children and Young person's services?" 
· "Alexa, how can I request a Call Back?" 
· "Alexa, tell me about Macular Degeneration Symptoms." 

While listening to an audio book/ magazine Alexa will ask whether you would like to resume from the last title. Try some of these commands: 

“Alexa, Play the magazine”
“Alexa, Play an episode from {magazine-name}”
“Alexa, Play episode on {genre-name}”
Media Controls

Pause the audio - Pause, Stop
Resume the audio - Continue Playing, Resume
Start again from the beginning - Start Over
Next audio - Play next, Next audio, Next episode
Previous audio - Play previous, Previous audio, Previous episode
